mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(bno, replytext, replyer, secret_reply) values (#{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{secretReply})
mapper.select:
select r.rno, bno, r.replytext, r.replyer, r.secret_reply AS secretReply, r.regdate, r.updatedate, m.user_name as userName,
(select writer FROM tbl_board WHERE bno = r.bno) AS writer from tbl_reply r, tbl_member m where r.replyer=m.user_id and bno=#{bno} ORDER BY rno desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno=#{bno}
